title: A Naked Smear of 'MAGA Republicans'
itunes:title: A Naked Smear of 'MAGA Republicans'
description:
After the bizarre story involving Paul Pelosi and a nudist allegedly breaking into the Pelosi home and attacking the Speaker's husband with a hammer, Charlie breaks down the various theories that have developed about what might have transpired in the early morning hours in San Francisco. Why does any of it matter? Charlie examines how the media seized the alleged attack to smear millions of "MAGA Republicans" as hateful and violent and why we need to push back on the narrative and ask for more transparency, including the surveillance footage from the home. He also breaks news live on the show about the person responsible for breaking into Katie Hobbs’ HQ.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
